main event: On 14 April 1952 in Walertown, S. Dak., a civilian observed a round, white object that went straight up for 13 minutes before disappearing. The conclusion was that it was a W2k balloon.
interesting points: The object was observed for a relatively long duration of 13 minutes.
The object was described as round and white, exhibiting unusual behavior by going straight up and disappearing.
The conclusion of the observation was that it was a W2k balloon, despite the unusual movements reported.
The observer was a 17-year-old student from Los Angeles, California.
The observation took place in slightly windy and hazy conditions.
